A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The problem with this new trilogy is that there are no original ideas. The prequels besides the dialogue and Jar Jar Binks were good movies. Why? Because they introduced new ideas. They introduced Clones\, Jedi Academy\, The Republic\, The Sepratist Alliance\, and super cool lightsaber battles. This trilogy just feeds off of peoples nostalgia of the OT. This movie was just a Return of the Jedi and Empire Strikes Back Mashup.
